text: "Red Hill Mining Town" is a 1987 song by Irish rock group U2 and is the sixth track from their fifth studio album The Joshua Tree. It was meant to be the second single from the album but was shelved and replaced by I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For. It was not played live in concerts until 2017. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Rock songs Category:U2 songs
title: Red Hill Mining Town
